fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to talk to any faction at night. You’ll join their factional chat, if they have any, and they’ll be notified you’re visiting.
- During the day, you may instead choose to talk to an individual player in a private night chat.
- During the day, you may choose to talk to the dead.
- During the day, you may instead choose to send an anonymous player to a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a target and you only know their name.
- Your target can win with any faction except their original as long as you’re alive.
- If your target dies, you become a survivor.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see your target win.
